problem.markdown:
>>In comparison to commercial agriculture, organic agriculture does all of the following except<< () avoid using synthetic fertilizers (x) eliminate erosion () enhance biodiversity () increase soil biological activity () retain organic matter in the soil
[explanation] Organic agriculture generally enhances ecosystem services however, it still involves plowing the soil, thereby allowing some erosion to occur. [explanation]
problem.p: In comparison to commercial agriculture, organic agriculture does all of the following except

choicegroup.label: In comparison to commercial agriculture, organic agriculture does all of the following except
choicegroup.choice: retain organic matter in the soil

div.p: Organic agriculture generally enhances ecosystem services however, it still involves plowing the soil, thereby allowing some erosion to occur.
